modName: Skyrim Monster Mod Additions - Conjuration V5
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/2570251-1334784852.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/2570251-1334784913.png[/img][/center]

Skyrim Monster Mod Additions - Conjuration v5
=============================================


CHANGELOG:


01/06/12 - Fully compatible with Momod V7, adding the new monster to conjure

-Balrog
-Elemental
-Death Naga
-Alpha Drake
-Fire Giant
-Female Giant
-Ice Giant
-Gloom Wraith (both types)
-Hyena 
-Ice Naga
-Raptor
-Snow Devil
-Bone Horror
-Therium
-Troll Bones
-Brown Werecat
-Rabid Werewolf
-Wraith
-Nekker Wraith
-Reaper Spirit

28/04/12 - Fixed the Blood-eye Werewolf spell which no longer summons a werecroc, fixed the elemental potency bug - dragon spells work properly now.

26/04/12 - V4 Fixes crashing bugs that were in v1, so all previously unusable creatures are now included with the new Momod v5 ones.  Here is what has been added,

-Bullvore
-Horned Bullvore
-Abomination
-Death Golem
-Daedroth
-Drake
-Wingless Drake
-Rot Fiend
-Drowner
-Gargoyle
-Guar
-Dark Harpy
-Hunger
-Nekker
-Pale Nekker
-Ogre
-Sea Drake
-Sea Dragon
-Werecat
-Werecrocodile
-Blood-eye Werewolf
-Grey Werewolf
-Red Werewolf
-Brown Fur Werewolf

I have also moved the spell tomes to the Bits and Pieces store in Solitude to make it compatible with Midas Magic.

21/04/12 - V3 Combines the dragon pack with the main file, named the dragons and tomes to be more descriptive. 

18/04/12 - V2 adds more spell tomes to riverwood traders, fixes cowardly creatures, retextures the spell tome cover
Creatures added:

-Snow Bear
-Bear Cub
-Chaurus (purple glow)
-Glowing Chaurus (yellow glow)
-Dark Chaurus (blue glow)
-Darkraven
-Ancient Draugr, male and female variants

13/04/12 - V1.1 gets rid of bugged monsters (Abomination,Bulvore,Daedroth,Hunger,Nekker,Werecat,Werecroc) and I will work on fixing them for v2








Description:

This mod aims to build on the immersion of Skyrim Monster Mod by adding new spell tomes which will allow you to summon the monsters from dogtown1\'s mod.
You can purchase the spell tomes from Bits and Pieces in Soltude, you will find that they range in price but you get what you pay for.  The tomes are levelled for different skill levels from novice to master, priced appropriately for each creature.


Here are the rest of the available creatures (not mentioned above) to command in alphabetical order,

-Arachas
-Baby Mammoth
-Baphomet
-Black Hills Goblin
-Bloodthirsty Draugr
-Boar
-Bone Draugr
-Chaurus Reaper
-Cyclops
-Daedra Spider
-Dagon
-Dark Draugr
-Dark Spirit
-Draco Griffon
-Draugr Monk
-Draugr Priest
-Dremora Mistress
-Durzog
-Falmer Assassin
-Falmer Beast
-Falmer Mage
-Fire Wraith
-Frostbite Spider
-Giant Brute
-Giant Chaurus Spider
-Giant Cyclops
-Glass Atronach
-Guar
-Hagraven Horror
-Harpy
-Horned Falmer Nightprowler
-Lilith
-Living Flame
-Minotaur
-Pale Draugr
-Parasite
-Poison Shade
-Rotted Draugr
-Shade Atronach
-Skeletal Draugr
-Skeleton Warrior
-Spirit Atronach
-Steel Centurion
-Steel Sphere Guardian
-Steel Spider
-Tiger
-Treant
-Tree Spider
-Triceratops
-Undead Raven
-Wisp Maiden
-Wolf Ghost
-Vampire Wolf

You can also find SkyMomod Additions - New Items here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14767 which is a growing mod that adds brand new, appropriate collectables and craftables for the Momod creatures.

01/05/12 - Added the fixed script to make all summon spells work, place the scripts folder in the data folder for it to work.


Requirements: 

Skyrim Monster mod v5, download here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9694


Installation:

Unpack the ESP into the Steam\\Steamapps\\Common\\Skyrim\\Data,  To uninstall just remove the file.


Compatibility:

Everything in this mod is new so there will be no issues with mod clashing apart from the know Momod ones (WIS for one), check the Monster Mod comments and compatibilty discussion


If you want to see more of my work check my Skyrim profile and click the files tab.
author: Ironman5000
